file_content.text: Where's Eerena? You said you would bring her back!
I found her. I'm sorry. There was nothing I could do.
Oh. Oh, I see. Where can I get a blaster?
Maybe you shouldn't have a rifle just now.
It's not for... I'm going to kill every Regulator in Talaos City. Then I'm going to kill their Hutt masters.
Okay. First supply tent on the right. Bring it here, and I'll show you how to fire it.
